Body: hi all, i am not new to android but recently got hold of this android kitkat 4.4.2 phone and i cant figure out what the strange circle on screen is . it comes after screen gets locked and i try to unlock the screen.i have few questions1) whats the empty circle marked as 1 in above screnshot ? it keeps moving nearby the lock sign.2) it was previously filled with voilet/blue color but now a days it shows empty , why is that ?3) what happens when i click the circle ?, the marked item 2 starts to lower down on ruler marked as item 3.4) previously marked item 2 was coming all the way down to i guess 25-30 readings . but nowadays it just comes till reading 5-6, why is that ?i havent removed any preinstalled apps , to make sure i did nt caused these hanges.,phone is not rooted , it is as it came from factory.Thanks for your time.
Title: Strange floating round circle after screen lock on Android 4.4.2 phone

history.Text: ![enter image description here][1]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/VPcws.jpghi all, i am not new to android but recently got hold of this android kitkat 4.4.2 phone and i cant figure out what the strange circle on screen is . it comes after screen gets locked and i try to unlock the screen.i have few questions1) whats the empty circle marked as 1 in above screnshot ? it keeps moving nearby the lock sign.2) it was previously filled with voilet/blue color but now a days it shows empty , why is that ?3) what happens when i click the circle ?, the marked item 2 starts to lower down on ruler marked as item 3.4) previously marked item 2 was coming all the way down to i guess 25-30 readings . but nowadays it just comes till reading 5-6, why is that ?i havent removed any preinstalled apps , to make sure i did nt caused these hanges.,phone is not rooted , it is as it came from factory.Thanks for your time.
Strange floating round circle after screen lock on Android 4.4.2 phone
